attributes.action: Scrap PFI (Private Finance Initative) in the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PFI funding for new buildings in the health sector is providing a financial millstone in the NHS for years to come. It is being used as a financial tool to make the Chancellor Gordon Brown's accounts look better than they are. We call upon the Government to scrap PFI funding in the NHS.
